name: Retis Tormentum
description:
Play a fast, dynamic, cyberpunk rythm game !

Retis Tormentum Corporation is a big company using human's brain to power up a giant computer.
You live in this dystopian world, raising your child alone.
But one day, unable to find a job, your only solution is to apply to Retis Tormentum Corporation's program.

Work hard. Don't die. Your speed is your only means of survival in the cyberspace.

The game is actually in Alpha.

Keep hope alive and maybe you will escape.




Level 1 and Level 1 hard mode playable.

What will come in further updates :
- 2 more levels (both with story and infinity mode).
-6 soundtracks (one for each level with an alternative).
-You will be able to find a way to escape the corporation in 2nd and 3rd levels.
-The game will be translated in french.
-A different art for Conclusion.
-And of course... The juice !
